'''Sanctifying Elixir''' is a [[consumable]] item used by the [[Artifact Transmuter]] to define [[Artifact]]s of a chosen set.

==How to Obtain==
* Extracting a certain number of upgraded Artifacts using the [[Artifact Transmuter]] (once per [[Version]]).
* Exploring [[Natlan]]'s open world.
** [[Tribal Secret Space]]s &times; 6
** [[Tona's Flame's Restitution]] Level 10, 20, 30 and 40 Rewards.
* Unlock [[Gnostic Hymn]] [[Battle Pass]] and reach Level 26.
* Participate in certain [[Event]]s:
** [[Gift for a New Horizon: A Thank-You Gift]]
